Question.1: {"text":"You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:","option":[{"value":"Don’t dare to interrupt them","load":-5},{"value":"Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait","load":-2},{"value":"Listen, but with only with half an ear","load":2},{"value":"Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment","load":5}],"id":1}
Question.2: {"text":"You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:","option":[{"value":"Look at your watch every two minutes","load":-5},{"value":"Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet","load":-2},{"value":"Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late","load":2},{"value":"Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently","load":5}],"id":2}
Question.3: {"text":"You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:","option":[{"value":"Don’t dare contradict them","load":-5},{"value":"Think that they are obviously right","load":-2},{"value":"Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail","load":2},{"value":"Continuously interrupt your colleague","load":5}],"id":3}
Question.4: {"text":"You are taking part in a guided tour of a museum. You:","option":[{"value":"Are a bit too far towards the back so don’t really hear what the guide is saying","load":-5},{"value":"Follow the group without question","load":-2},{"value":"Make sure that everyone is able to hear properly","load":2},{"value":"Are right up the front, adding your own comments in a loud voice","load":5}],"id":4}
